text: You want to donate to a children's charity?
If it is a reputable one, for sure.
It's called Save the Children
Yea, I've hear of them
They are very reputable
I know, they do a lot of good stuff and most of the donations actually goes towards the programs
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2)
Split it 50/50
Sounds good.  So you are saying $1
Yes, sorry if that wasn't clear
I just wanted to clarify
$1 or $2 isn't much in the scheme of things but it all adds up I suppose
yes it all helps, the children will be thankful
I think my mom's church actually did the sponsor a child thing for while. but that was a long time ago
sounds like you are from a caring family
haha more than some, less than others!
it all really helps, it takes a community
no doubt. children should have all the opportunity to thrive that they can. not their fault if they were born into tough circumstances
Thank you for your donation, have a blessed day
Thank you, you too
